 36#ifndef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 37template<>
 38struct List<op::prod>
 39{
 40  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 41			 be::cml,
 42			 be::blas,
 43			 be::mercury_sal, 
 44			 be::cvsip,
 45			 be::generic>::type type;
 46};

 48template<>
 49struct List<op::prodj>
 50{
 51  typedef Make_type_list<be::user,
 52			 be::cml,
 53			 be::blas,
 54			 be::mercury_sal, 
 55			 be::cvsip,
 56			 be::generic>::type type;
 57};
 58#endif
 59
 60/// Generic evaluator for matrix-matrix products.
 61template <typename Block0,
 62	  typename Block1,
 63	  typename Block2>
 64struct Evaluator<op::prod, be::generic, 
 65                 void(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&),
 66		 typename enable_if_c<Block1::dim == 2 && Block2::dim == 2>::type>
 67{
 68  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 69  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)
 70  { return true; }
 71
 72  static void exec(Block0& r, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
 73  {
 74    typedef typename Block0::value_type RT;
 75
 76    for (index_type i=0; i<r.size(2, 0); ++i)
 77      for (index_type j=0; j<r.size(2, 1); ++j)
 78      {
 79	RT sum = RT();
 80	for (index_type k=0; k<a.size(2, 1); ++k)
 81	{
 82	  sum += a.get(i, k) * b.get(k, j);
 83	}
 84	r.put(i, j, sum);
 85    }
 86  }
 87};
 88
 89/// Generic evaluator for matrix-matrix conjugate products.
 90template <typename Block0,
 91	  typename Block1,
 92	  typename Block2>
 93struct Evaluator<op::prodj, be::generic,
 94                 void(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)>
 95{
 96  static bool const ct_valid = true;
 97  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)
 98  { return true; }
 99
100  static void exec(Block0& r, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
101  {
102    typedef typename Block0::value_type RT;
103
104    for (index_type i=0; i<r.size(2, 0); ++i)
105      for (index_type j=0; j<r.size(2, 1); ++j)
106      {
107	RT sum = RT();
108	for (index_type k=0; k<a.size(2, 1); ++k)
109	{
110	  sum += a.get(i, k) * conj(b.get(k, j));
111	}
112	r.put(i, j, sum);
113    }
114  }
115};
116
117/// Generic evaluator for matrix-vector products.
118template <typename Block0,
119	  typename Block1,
120	  typename Block2>
121struct Evaluator<op::prod, be::generic,
122                 void(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&),
123		 typename enable_if_c<Block1::dim == 2 && Block2::dim == 1>::type>
124{
125  static bool const ct_valid = true;
126  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)
127  { return true; }
128
129  static void exec(Block0& r, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
130  {
131    typedef typename Block0::value_type RT;
132
133    for (index_type i=0; i<r.size(1, 0); ++i)
134    {
135      RT sum = RT();
136      for (index_type k=0; k<a.size(2, 1); ++k)
137      {
138        sum += a.get(i, k) * b.get(k);
139      }
140      r.put(i, sum);
141    }
142  }
143};
144
145/// Generic evaluator for vector-matrix products.
146template <typename Block0,
147	  typename Block1,
148	  typename Block2>
149struct Evaluator<op::prod, be::generic,
150                 void(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&),
151		 typename enable_if_c<Block1::dim == 1 && Block2::dim == 2>::type>
152{
153  static bool const ct_valid = true;
154  static bool rt_valid(Block0&, Block1 const&, Block2 const&)
155  { return true; }
156
157  static void exec(Block0& r, Block1 const& a, Block2 const& b)
158  {
159    typedef typename Block0::value_type RT;
160
161    for (index_type i=0; i<r.size(); ++i)
162    {
163      RT sum = RT();
164      for (index_type k=0; k<b.size(2, 0); ++k)
165      {
166        sum += a.get(k) * b.get(k, i);
167      }
168      r.put(i, sum);
169    }
170  }
171};
172
173} // namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher
174} // namespace vsip_csl

176namespace vsip

178namespace impl

180
181/// Generic matrix-matrix product.
182template <typename T0,
183	  typename T1,
184	  typename T2,
185	  typename Block0,
186	  typename Block1,
187	  typename Block2>
188void
189generic_prod(
190  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
191  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b,
192  Matrix<T2, Block2>       r)
193{
194  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
195
196  assert(r.size(0) == a.size(0));
197  assert(r.size(1) == b.size(1));
198  assert(a.size(1) == b.size(0));
199
200#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
201  Evaluator<op::prod, be::cvsip,
202    void(Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>::exec
203    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
204#else
205  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod, void,
206    Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
207    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
208#endif
209}
210
211
212/// Generic matrix-matrix conjugate product.
213template <typename T0,
214	  typename T1,
215	  typename T2,
216	  typename Block0,
217	  typename Block1,
218	  typename Block2>
219void
220generic_prodj(
221  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
222  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b,
223  Matrix<T2, Block2>       r)
224{
225  assert(r.size(0) == a.size(0));
226  assert(r.size(1) == b.size(1));
227  assert(a.size(1) == b.size(0));
228
229#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
230  impl::generic_prod(a, conj(b), r);
231#else
232  vsip_csl::dispatch<vsip_csl::dispatcher::op::prodj, void,
233    Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
234    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
235#endif
236}
237
238
239/// Generic matrix-vector product.
240template <typename T0,
241	  typename T1,
242	  typename T2,
243	  typename Block0,
244	  typename Block1,
245	  typename Block2>
246void
247generic_prod(
248  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
249  const_Vector<T1, Block1> b,
250  Vector<T2, Block2>       r)
251{
252  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
253
254  assert(r.size() == a.size(0));
255  assert(a.size(1) == b.size());
256
257#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
258  Evaluator<op::prod, be::cvsip,
259    void(Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>::exec
260    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
261#else
262  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod, void,
263    Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
264    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
265#endif
266}
267
268
269/// Generic vector-matrix product.
270template <typename T0,
271	  typename T1,
272	  typename T2,
273	  typename Block0,
274	  typename Block1,
275	  typename Block2>
276void
277generic_prod(
278  const_Vector<T0, Block0> a,
279  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b,
280  Vector<T2, Block2>       r)
281{
282  using namespace vsip_csl::dispatcher;
283
284  assert(r.size() == b.size(1));
285  assert(a.size() == b.size(0));
286
287#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
288  Evaluator<op::prod, dispatcher::be::cvsip,
289    void(Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&)>::exec
290    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
291#else
292  vsip_csl::dispatch<op::prod, void,
293    Block2&, Block0 const&, Block1 const&>
294    (r.block(), a.block(), b.block());
295#endif
296}

301
302/// Matrix-matrix product dispatch.
303template <typename T0,
304	  typename T1,
305	  typename Block0,
306	  typename Block1>
307const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type>
308prod(
309  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
310  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b)
311{
312  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
313
314  Matrix<return_type> r(a.size(0), b.size(1));
315
316  impl::generic_prod(a, b, r);
317
318  return r;
319}
320
321
322/// Matrix-vector product dispatch.
323template <typename T0,
324	  typename T1,
325	  typename Block0,
326	  typename Block1>
327const_Vector<typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type>
328prod(
329  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
330  const_Vector<T1, Block1> b)
331{
332  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
333
334  Vector<return_type> r(a.size(0));
335
336  impl::generic_prod(a, b, r);
337
338  return r;
339}

342/// Vector-Matrix product dispatch.
343template <typename T0,
344	  typename T1,
345	  typename Block0,
346	  typename Block1>
347const_Vector<typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type>
348prod(
349  const_Vector<T0, Block0> a,
350  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b)
351{
352  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
353
354  Vector<return_type> r(b.size(1));
355
356  impl::generic_prod(a, b, r);
357
358  return r;
359}

362/// [3x3] Matrix-matrix product dispatch.
363template <typename T0,
364	  typename T1,
365	  typename Block0,
366	  typename Block1>
367const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type>
368prod3(
369  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> a,
370  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> b)
371{
372  assert( a.size(0) == 3 );
373  assert( a.size(1) == 3 );
374  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
375
376  Matrix<return_type> r(a.size(0), b.size(1));
377
378  impl::generic_prod(a, b, r);
379
380  return r;
381}

450/// Matrix-Matrix (with hermitian) product dispatch.
451template <typename T0,
452          typename T1,
453          typename Block0,
454          typename Block1>
455const_Matrix<typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type>
456prodh(
457  const_Matrix<complex<T0>, Block0> m0,
458  const_Matrix<complex<T1>, Block1> m1) 
459    VSIP_NOTHROW
460{
461  typedef typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type return_type;
462
463  Matrix<return_type> r(m0.size(0), m1.size(0));
464
465  impl::generic_prodj(m0, trans(m1), r);
466
467  return r;
468}
469
470
471/// Matrix-Matrix (with complex conjugate) product dispatch.
472template <typename T0,
473          typename T1,
474          typename Block0,
475          typename Block1>
476const_Matrix<typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type>
477prodj(
478  const_Matrix<complex<T0>, Block0> m0,
479  const_Matrix<complex<T1>, Block1> m1)
480    VSIP_NOTHROW
481{
482  typedef typename Promotion<complex<T0>, complex<T1> >::type return_type;
483
484  Matrix<return_type> r(m0.size(0), m1.size(1));
485  
486  impl::generic_prodj(m0, m1, r);
487
488  return r;
489}

492/// Matrix-Matrix (with transpose) product dispatch.
493template <typename T0,
494          typename T1,
495          typename Block0,
496          typename Block1>
497const_Matrix<typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type>
498prodt(
499  const_Matrix<T0, Block0> m0,
500  const_Matrix<T1, Block1> m1)
501    VSIP_NOTHROW
502{
503  typedef typename Promotion<T0, T1>::type return_type;
504
505  Matrix<return_type> r(m0.size(0), m1.size(0));
506
507  impl::generic_prod(m0, trans(m1), r);
508
509  return r;
510}
